BACON, PORK PANCETTA ITALIAN ROLLED STICK CURED RAW REF PROP12/MAQ3 VACUUM-
CHEESE, PROVOLONE SLICED .75 OZ TWIN PACK REF
SALT, KOSHER NOT IODIZED GROUND FINE BOX SHELF STABLE

recipeMethods.stepInstructions:
Assembly 1 - Mise en place:

1. Julienne cooked pancetta 1/4".

2. Hold at 135°F or above.

Assembly 3 - To Prepare Burger Patties:

1. Preheat flattop griddle to 400°F.

2. Season patties with 1/8 tsp each of salt & pepper.

3. Place patties on flat top and cook for about 2 minutes per side, or 
until well seared and internal temperature reaches at least 155°F.

4. Transfer cooked patties in a single layer in half #200 perforated 
pans set over solid #200 half pans.

5. Place 1 Provolone cheese slice on each patty, and hold in warmer 
until service.

Assembly 4 - To Assemble and Serve 1 Burger:

1. Place the two halves of a hamburger bun on a plate. 

2. Build each burger in the following order from bottom to top:
 1 tbsp marinara spread on bottom bun
 1 ozl spoodle of julienned pancetta
 1 burger patty with provolone
 1 tbsp marinated red pepper
 1 tbsp lemon Arugula

2. Close the sandwich and serve immediately.
